name: Secret Crossing
summary:
“If you’ve enlightened us… You’ve to take responsibility, right?”

Stressed out from work, as you step into the forbidden zone, attracted by a sticky and strange dream, the temptation of romantic flowers begins…!!

Secret Crossing that gets even more sweet and irresistible as you try to resist. They need your “touch” to bloom in love.

Bloom your partner by pouring your love potion!
